content:
Dear Sekhar Kammula,

On behalf of the North American Telugu Society (NATS), we are delighted to invite you to attend the America Telugu Sambaralu to be held at NJ Expo Center, Edison, NJ from May 26th to May 28th, 2023. NATS is a non-profit organization dedicated to serving the Telugu community across North America through cultural, spiritual, social, and educational activities.

As a highly respected and talented Telugu film director, we believe that your presence at our convention would be an inspiration and a great source of motivation for our attendees. Our three-day event is packed with a variety of activities, including star-studded cultural programs, literary and spiritual activities, CME sessions, Zellenial (Next generation group) programs and activities, alumni meetings, health forums, Women’s forum, motivational speeches, and business seminars. The convention serves the purpose of providing a platform to exchange ideas, interact with each other, and celebrate a rich cultural heritage along with NATS basic principle of ‘SERVING THE COMMUNITY’.

We would be honored to have you share your experiences and insights with our attendees during the mainstage event. Your presence at our convention would add immense value to our event, and we are confident that our attendees will be delighted to have the opportunity to meet and interact with you. We appreciate your consideration of our invitation and look forward to your positive response.

Please feel free to contact us for any further information or queries. Thank you for your time and support.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
On behalf of North American Telugu Society (NATS)
